title: How to Visit New Orleans Like Beyonc√© and Jay Z
text:
Beyonc√©, Jay Z, and Solange have been spotted at various events around New Orleans over the past few days. The Big Easy is Solange‚Äôs part-time home, so she‚Äôs able to give a local‚Äôs tour to her sister and brother-in-law. 
The famous family (along with Blue Ivy and Solange‚Äôs son, Daniel Julez Smith Jr.) was spotted hanging out on a balcony in the city‚Äôs French Quarter on Sunday. They were wearing beads and watching the annual Mardi Gras Dog Parade below. Beyonc√© y Blue en Nueva Orleans #NOLA pic.twitter.com/tZe6NJtTWn 
‚Äî BEYONC√â VENEZUELA (@BeyoncVenezuela) February 18, 2017 
They have also been making stops at some of New Orleans‚Äô best restaurants. They ate at Willa Jean, a Southern comfort food restaurant, on Saturday, where they are rumored to have ordered fried chicken and biscuits . The restaurant opened in 2015, and last week chef Kelly Fields was named a semifinalist for a James Beard Award as outstanding pastry chef. Jay Z attended Jay Electronica's concert last night at the historic Preservation Hall - New Orleans. TIDALXNOLA pic.twitter.com/JzXsz4bzuv 
After dinner Saturday, Jay Z made an appearance at New Orleans‚Äô historic Preservation Hall club for a show by Jay Electronica (who is signed to Jay Z's Roc Nation label). The Carters courtside in New Orleans #NBAAllStar pic.twitter.com/V1YzzOya4y 
‚Äî Beyonc√© Aus ü§∞üèΩ (@BeyonceAUS) February 20, 2017 
On Sunday evening, Beyonc√© and her hubby sat courtside at the NBA All-Star Weekend game at the Smoothie King Center.
